title: 1 bed walkout patios
posting_body: Welcome Home to Ascend at Red Rocks Apartment Homes
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 850 Sq.
Ascend at Red Rocks Apartment Homes offers spacious one, two, and three bedroom apartments nestled in the foothills of the Rocky Mountains.
Only minutes away from downtown Denver, the community is in close proximity to numerous parks, shopping destinations, restaurants, and entertainment.
Residents can enjoy a dip in the pool, take a stroll with their dog around the community or take a short drive to enjoy the nearby countryside.
Whether it’s the fast pace of city life or a relaxing mountain atmosphere you’re looking for, Ascend at Red Rocks Apartment Homes has something for everyone.
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
